definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: With stimulants in particular, like meth and cocaine, they suppress the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 成瘾性药物，例如冰毒和可卡因，可以破坏食欲。

sentences.english: One could argue that smoking, by its very nature, is addictive.
sentences.chinese: 有人可能认为抽烟从本质上说就具有成瘾性。

sentences.english: It is much more destructive than opium can ever hope to be, even though just as addictive.
sentences.chinese: 破坏性比鸦片更强数倍，成瘾性还是一样的厉害。

sentences.english: Drugs have a hierarchy of addictive potential based on the speed that they reach your brain.
sentences.chinese: 毒品的成瘾性和进入大脑的速度密切相关。

sentences.english: Or, in the case of addiction, a drug that weakens the associations that stir craving.
sentences.chinese: 或者，在成瘾性方面，药物减弱了嗑药的联系。

sentences.english: The legalization of addictive drugs would in no way force individuals into the habit.
sentences.chinese: 成瘾性药物的合法化，绝不会强逼人们吸毒成性。

sentences.english: These can be used long term, have no side effects and are non-addictive.
sentences.chinese: 这些可长期使用，没有任何副作用，无成瘾性。

sentences.english: Doctors knew that nicotine was addictive, and they had ways to treat the addiction.
sentences.chinese: 医生们都知道尼古丁有成瘾性，也有治疗的良策。

sentences.english: Many things to habituate, someone said, could be given up.
sentences.chinese: 有些专家说，很多成瘾性的行为可以戒除掉。

definition: Ritalin (brand name)/methylphenidate (stimulant drug used to treat ADHD)
